item.title: Trump Slams Charlamagne tha God for Fox News Interview Claiming a “Political Coup” in the Republican Party Is “Going on Right Now”
item.description: “He’s a Low IQ individual, has no idea what words are coming out of his mouth and knows nothing about me or what I have done,” the president wrote on Truth Social.
